message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm confident it can greatly benefit you.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a price of $2,200,000.  I'm open to hearing your thoughts on this.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. While I appreciate its value, I am looking to stay within a budget of $1,000,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,500,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
